nodes.text: The Stricture of Violence was a tenet of Vurk society which dealt with their opinion on the killing of others, however this excluded euthanasia. Vurk considered causing a death reprehensible, if it were self-defense or outright murder, because it silenced a person's ability to voice a new opinion or thought. During the Clone Wars, the Stricture was not altered by any conflict on the Vurk homeworld of Sembla, but Vurk who travelled off-world had to think differently about the Stricture because of deaths done in order to free slaves or end battles.
